description:
Mini Tomatoes
Fumi says that she wants to grow flowers at home. But what Mom bought was tomato seeds. Well, Mom says that if she`s going to plant something, she might as well plant something that`s more useful. But Grandma, who is passionate about gardening, blows up!
Traveling Alone
One summer day, Bunji decides to travel across the bridge where he has never been. Streets that he doesn`t know, children that he doesn`t know, shops that he doesn`t know... This is what Bunji experiences, his first trip alone.
Expert on Walking Along the Way
Fumi, who loves to stroll, gives a name to every stray cat in the neighborhood, and becomes friends with them, but nowadays she brings in information about the neighborhood.
Pinyari Comedy Show
The well known pinyari comedy show has begun! The chairman is obviously a pinyari. The participants are, of course, pinyari too. So the question is, what is today`s topic?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mini Tomatoes / Traveling Alone / Expert on Walking Along the Way / Pinyari Comedy Show
ミニトマト / ひとり旅 / より道名人 / ぴにゃり大喜利
